description: This file provides utility functions and data structures for configuring and establishing a connection to a SQLite database in a backend application. It includes configuration data classes, path resolution methods, extractors for parsing connection info, and functions for loading config and creating database connections.

classes.name: SqliteConfig
classes.description: Dataclass storing the SQLite database file path.

methods.name: Path _repo_root_from_this_file()
methods.description: Determines the repository root directory by ascending from this file's location.

methods.name: Optional[str] _extract_sqlite_file_path(db_connection_txt: str)
methods.description: Parses connection text to find the SQLite file path, supporting different line formats.

methods.name: SqliteConfig get_sqlite_config()
methods.description: Reads the database connection file, extracts the SQLite file path, validates, and returns configuration.

methods.name: sqlite3.Connection get_connection()
methods.description: Creates and returns a SQLite connection using the configuration loaded.
